thread.section_title: Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect place to stay
thread.title_full: Perfect place to stay - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: deborah_bijleveld
title: Perfect place to stay
text: Great location and very friendly and helpful staff. The bicycles, offered for free by the hotel, were a bit small for us but turned out to be very useful as the city was totally packed with cars due to holiday season. The Forbidden City is only 20 minutes by bike and also really great to cycle around the lake. The hotel is beautifully decorated and nice performances on different evenings. Very good breakfast.
